name: Text
description: A typography component for consistent text styling with size, weight, and semantic element support

accessibility.screenReader: Content is read as standard text. Semantic elements (headings, paragraphs) are announced appropriately.
knownLimitations: Heading hierarchy is not enforced - developers must ensure proper nesting

recommendedUsage: Use for all text content to ensure consistent typography. Use the `as` prop to render semantic elements like headings.
antiPatterns: Do not skip heading levels (e.g., h1 to h3). Avoid using color alone to convey meaning. Do not use Text for interactive elements.
